protein.specific_function: Has E3 ubiquitin ligase activity. The CCR4-NOT complex functions as general transcription regulation complex

reference.reference_text: Albert TK, Lemaire M, van Berkum NL, Gentz R, Collart MA, Timmers HT: Isolation and characterization of human orthologs of yeast CCR4-NOT complex subunits. Nucleic Acids Res. 2000 Feb 1;28(3):809-17.
